products.title: Esperto Grani Intenso
products.description: Intenso coffee beans are a blend specially developed to guarantee a strong, intense, concentrated coffee.A 100% robusta selection gives the blend depth and body, while the dark roast enhances the hints of bitter cocoa.

products.title: Ground coffee - Perfetto Moka
products.description: Perfetto Moka Irresistibile coffee is the result of the encounter between the skilful art of Bialetti’s master coffee roasters and the creative flair of Dolce&Gabbana.

products.title: Ground coffee - Perfetto Moka Cioccolato
products.description: Perfetto Moka Cioccolato ground coffee is the perfect coffee for your Moka pot.A gourmet coffee flavored with chocolate, with an unmistakable taste and aroma, highlighted even more by a fine, elegant structure.

products.title: Midnight
products.description: Bialetti Midnight capsules contain a coffee of fine Arabica origins enriched with Indonesian Robusta.Thanks to a painstaking origin selection process, this coffee contains 50% less caffeine than the Bialetti Napoli blend.

products.title: Ground coffee - Perfetto Moka KIT 3
products.description: Ricerca su 12.000 consumatori svolta da IRI, su selezione di prodotti venduti in Italia. prodottodellanno.it cat. Caffè.

products.title: Nespresso Compatible Capsules in alluminium
products.description: Decaffeinato Nespresso compatible capsules are designed for those who want to have an excellent decaffeinated coffee with a light, balanced flavor at home.

products.title: Cioccolato
products.description: Bialetti Cioccolato capsules contain a coffee with a chocolate aroma with delicate caramelized notes.

products.title: Ground coffee -  Decaffeinato
products.description: Perfetto Moka Decaffeinato ground coffee is the perfect decaffeinated coffee for your Moka pot.

products.title: Baby blue Rainbow
products.description: New Sunset Infinity collection: a wave of style with which to savour the taste of ‘la dolce vita’ one coffee at a time.

products.title: Bialetti Dolce & Gabbana Moka
products.description: Bialetti and Dolce&Gabbana together to celebrate the Italian coffee ritual.Created in 1933, the brainchild of Alfonso Bialetti, Moka Express has always been an undisputed icon of Italian style.

products.title: Moka Express Nera
products.description: Bialetti Moka Express: this is the original coffee maker, a symbol of Made in Italy quality, which offers the experience of the true Italian ritual of preparing a delicious cup of coffee. Also available in two different colors: red or black.

products.title: Venus
products.description: Bialetti Venus coffee maker has an unmistakable and elegant design. In addition, it guarantees high quality thanks to the patented safety valve that makes it easy to clean.

products.title: VenuDéco Glamor Red
products.description: The Mokina is the baby in the Bialetti family, conceived, designed and built to offer you all the taste of Bialetti coffee and all the power of a ristretto.

products.title: Kitty
products.description: Bialetti Kitty is the coffee maker resulting from an ongoing quest for new shapes and materials, suited to the changes and evolutions in tastes and habits.

products.title: Venus
products.description: Bialetti Venus coffee maker has an unmistakable and elegant design. In addition, it guarantees high quality thanks to the patented safety valve that makes it easy to clean.

products.title: Terracotta orange Gioia
products.description: New Sunset Infinity collection: a wave of style with which to savour the taste of ‘la dolce vita’ one coffee at a time.

products.title: Gioia Responsible
products.description: Gioia Responsible is a coffee machine designed to produce an excellent espresso while also being good for the planet. Gioia Responsible allows you to enjoy the best Bialetti coffee in the comfort of your home while respecting the environment.

products.title: Bialetti Gioia - Coffee Machine
products.description: The Gioia capsule coffee machine allows you to enjoy the best Bialetti espresso in the comfort of your home.

products.title: Gioia Responsible
products.description: Gioia Responsible is a coffee machine designed to produce an excellent espresso while also being good for the planet. Gioia Responsible allows you to enjoy the best Bialetti coffee in the comfort of your home while respecting the environment.

products.title: Super Bialetti -  Coffee Machine
products.description: The Super capsule coffee machine is sturdy and durable, the perfect ally even after multiple brews.

products.title: Bialetti Gioia  Machine
products.description: The Gioia capsule coffee machine allows you to enjoy the best Bialetti espresso in the comfort of your home.

products.title: Super Bialetti -  Coffee Machine
products.description: The Super capsule coffee machine is sturdy and durable, the perfect ally even after multiple brews.

products.title: Bialetti Gioia -  Coffee Machine
products.description: The Gioia capsule coffee machine allows you to enjoy the best Bialetti espresso in the comfort of your home.

products.title: Red Vacuum Flask with Cup/Lid
products.description: The Bialetti vacuum flask is the ideal way to enjoy your coffee or favourite drink wherever you like! Thanks to its double wall and the quality of the materials used, your drinks will stay hot for 12 hours or cold for 24 hours.

products.title: Grey Vacuum Flask
products.description: The grey vacuum flask allows you to enjoy your favourite coffee, always hot, whenever and wherever you want, without sacrificing a touch of colour and originality.

products.title: Coffee cup
products.description: The Bialetti Moka pot coffee cup in white porcelain, with the iconic little man with a mustache, was designed by Bialetti to enjoy a delicious coffee prepared according to true tradition with the Moka Express.

products.title: Set of 4 eight faces cups
products.description: Bialetti’s octagonal coffee cup in black and rose gold porcelain, with the iconic little man with a mustache, was designed by Bialetti to enjoy a delicious coffee prepared according to true Italian tradition.

products.title: Tricolore Mug
products.description: The Bialetti Tricolore mug is an ode to Italian identity.Bialetti and the famous little man with the mustache have always been famous interpreters and ambassadors of ‘Made in Italy’ the world over.

products.title: Steel Manual Milk Frother
products.description: The Bialetti manual milk frother is for anyone who loves to pamper themselves with a creamy cappuccino.

products.title: White Electric Milk Frother
products.description: The Bialetti white electric milk frother is for anyone who loves to pamper themselves with a creamy cappuccino, latte macchiato or frothed milk.

products.title: Tuttocrema-milk frother
products.description: Bialetti Tuttocrema is the simplest and most practical way to obtain a soft crema.Ideal for enjoying a cappuccino, latte macchiato or frothed milk in the comfort of your home.

products.title: Milk Frother
products.description: The Bialetti glass Milk Frother is the simplest and most practical way to obtain a soft crema!Ideal for enjoying a cappuccino, latte macchiato or frothed milk in the comfort of your home.
